movies.title: Duniyadari
movies.plot: Shreyas Talwalkar gets admitted to a college where he meets DSP, a rookie guy in the college who is the leader of a gang, after sometime they become good friends. There is also another gang leader Sainath who has rivlary with DSP. Meanwhile Shreyas sees Shireen a newcomer girl and falls in love with her at the first sight. Dsp is having an affair with Surekha who is studying in his college. When a guy tries to propose Surekha, DSP beats him and during this fight, Shreyas gets caught by Inspector Inamdar and gets slapped by him. when Dsp and his gang sees Inamdar's daughter Meenakshi in the college, they plan to avenge Shreyas by making Meenakshi fall in love with Shreyas. Their plan succeeds but Shreyas doesn't love Meenakshi, while Shreyas and Shireen are in love with each other. Shreyas is suffering from somekind of Nasal disease. Surekha gets married and DSP gets completely broken. Shreyas comes to know that Shireen's marriage is fixed with Sainath. Meanwhile Shreyas tells ...
movies.simplePlot: Shreyas discovers the magic of love and friendship in college days; only to be perplexed with the choices to be made.

biography.bio: Swwapnil Joshi is an actor, known for Mumbai Pune Mumbai (2010), Duniyadari (2013) and Mumbai Pune Mumbai 2 (2015). He has been married to Leena Aradhye since December 16, 2011. He was previously married to Jui Raut.
biography.name: Swwapnil Joshi

biography.bio: Ankush Chaudhari is an actor and director, known for Duniyadari (2013), Ti Saddhya Kay Karte (2017) and Yanda Kartavya Aahe (2006).
biography.name: Ankush Chaudhari

biography.bio: Urmila Kanitkar is an actress, known for Duniyadari (2013), I Want to Be a Mother (2011) and Time Pass (2014).
biography.name: Urmila Kanitkar

biography.bio: Sai Tamhankar is an actress, known for Hunterrr (2015), Duniyadari (2013) and Ghajini (2008).
biography.name: Sai Tamhankar

biography.bio: Jitendra Joshi is an actor, known for Tukaram (2012), Baghtos Kay Mujra Kar (2017) and Shala (2011).
biography.name: Jitendra Joshi

biography.bio: Sushant Shellar is an actor, known for Duniyadari (2013), Aaila Re!! (2006) and Encounter: The Killing (2002).
biography.name: Sushant Shellar

biography.bio: Sandeep Kulkarni is an actor and producer, known for Dombivli Fast (2005), D-Day (2013) and Shwaas (2004). He has been married to Kanchan Naik since 1999. They have one child.
biography.name: Sandeep Kulkarni

biography.bio: Richa Pariyalli is an actress, known for Duniyadari (2013).
biography.name: Richa Pariyalli

biography.bio: Uday Sabnis is an actor, known for Lage Raho Munna Bhai (2006), Sarkar (2005) and Naam Hai Akira (2016).
biography.name: Uday Sabnis
